actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide for assistance in international drug control through the use of trade policy.

summary.text: Directs the President to embargo trade and investment with any nation when the President determines that the government of such nation has failed to take steps to prevent narcotic drugs from entering the United States unlawfully.

titles.title: A bill to provide for assistance in international drug control through the use of trade policy.
